Jackie Sawiris bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Jọdan na Ijipt, odee na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ime ihe nkiri dika nye Arab Majida na Knightmare site na 1993 ruo 1994
Egwuregwu ndị ọzọ a ma ama gụnyere igwu Roz na Eyes Wide Shut (1999).
Omume ya na Knightmare bụ ọrụ Sawiris, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi ahụ ruo afọ abụọ ruo mgbe usoro ahụ kwụsịrị na 1994, na-anọchi onye na-eme ihe nkiri David Learner onye na-arụ ọrụ osisi Pickle

Ọrụ ya na usoro ahụ bụ inye ụfọdụ enyemaka na-atọ ọchị, Majida na-akpọkarị ndị Dungeoneers n'ime onwe ya na na Episod nke mbu nke oge nke asaa ọ gbanwere okpu ikpe ziri ezi mbụ nwere mpi maka nke ọhụrụ (zuru ezu na visor), nke na-ewe iwe nke Treguard (Hugo Myatt).

Ihe nkiri na TV ndị ọzọ ahọpụtara gụnyere 45 Minutes to Rammalah (2013), Incendies (2010), 10 Days to War (2008), The Bill (1998), The Big Swap (1998), Emmerdale (4 episodes in 1998), egwuregwu vidio Krazy Ivan (1995) na Death Machine (1994).
Kemgbe 1988 Sawiris arụwo ọrụ n'azụ igwefoto dị ka onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe na fim  Ọ bụ osote onye nduzi (1st AD/2nd Unit) na The Mummy Returns (2001)
Ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ mmepụta na ihe omume iri na abụọ nke The Wire na 2003.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na nhọrọ nke ọrụ na ihe nkiri, ụfọdụ edere, duzie ma mee onwe ya.
